sentence.Network_en: The boss assigned his car to his creditor.
sentence.Network_cn: 那工头把自己的小汽车让与了债权人.

sentence.Network_en: Their backs are to the wall. If they don't find another creditor, they will go bankrupt.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的处境困难, 如果找不到另一个贷款的人, 他们就要破产.

sentence.Network_en: I had to run away from my creditor whom I made a usurious loan.
sentence.Network_cn: 我借了高利贷不得不四处躲债.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French crediteur, from Latin creditor, from credit- (see credit)

entry.def: Your creditors are the people who you owe money to.

example.ex: The company said it would pay in full all its creditors.
example.tran: 该公司称将偿清所有债权人的债务。

means.word_mean: 1. a person to whom money is owed by a debtor; someone to whom an obligation exists

auth_sentence.content: The creditor debate thus goes round in circles.
auth_sentence.res_content: The creditor debate thus goes round in circles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The creditor debate thus goes round in circles.

auth_sentence.content: We tell a creditor that the check is in the mail.
auth_sentence.res_content: We tell a creditor that the check is in the mail.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We tell a creditor that the check is in the mail.

auth_sentence.content: Paris Club of creditor countries scrap half of DRCongo's debt.
auth_sentence.res_content: Paris Club of creditor countries scrap half of DRCongo's debt.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Paris Club of creditor countries scrap half of DRCongo's debt.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,主要表示"人或物器"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 前辈,前任,[被取代的]原有事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: pre前+de+cess走+or人→前面走过的人→前辈
act行动,行为,扮演+or人或物器→n.男演员,行动者,参与者
aggress侵略,进攻+or人或物器→n.侵略者,攻击者
arbitrate仲裁,公断+or人或物器→n.仲裁人,公断者
auth+or人或物器→n.作家,创造者
collect收集+or人或物器→n.收藏家,征收者
compress挤压+or人或物器→n.压缩机
conquer征服,战胜+or人或物器→n.征服者,胜利者
create创作+or人或物器→n.创造者,创作者
credit贷款+or人或物器→n.债权人
designate指定+or人或物器→n.指示者,指定者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发现者,侦察器,探测器,检波器,检电器
stems_affixes.word_buile: detect察觉,发觉+or人或物器→n.发现者,侦察器,探测器,检波器,检电器
educate教育+or人或物器→educator教育家
execute执行+or人或物器→n.遗嘱执行人,执行者
gladiate剑状的+or人或物器→n.角斗士,与野兽搏斗者
indicate指示+or人或物器→n.指示器,[化]指示剂
ment精神+or人或物器→n.导师
moderate中等的+or人或物器→n.调解人,仲裁人
oppress压迫,压制+or人或物器→n.压迫者
past+or人或物器→原来是拉丁文"牧羊人"的意思
process过程,处理+or人或物器→n.处理机,处理器
proct监督+or人或物器→n.代理人,学监
project投射出+or人或物器→n.放映机

stems_affixes.value_cn: 海员,水手,不大会晕船的人,船员
stems_affixes.word_buile: sail航行+or人或物器→n.海员,水手,不大会晕船的人,船员

stems_affixes.value_cn: 继承者,接任者,后续的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: success成功,胜利+or人或物器→继续着别人的成功→继承者,接任者
vend出售+or人或物器→n.小贩

sentences.en: When are distributions likely to be made to creditors?
sentences.cn: 最可能什么时候支付给债权人？

sentences.en: They agreed to repay their creditors over a period of three years.
sentences.cn: 他们同意3年内向债主还清欠款。

sentences.en: Their backs are to the wall.If they don’t find another creditor,they will go bankrupt.
sentences.cn: 他们的处境困难,如果找不到另一个贷款的人,他们就要破产。
